factionKeywords: adeptus astartesadeptus astartesadeptus astartesadeptus astartesadeptus astartesadeptus astartesadeptus astartesadeptus astartes
lore: Clad in Gravis armour, the Apothecary Biologis can advance through storms of enemy fire, vivispectrum at the ready to take bio-material samples for later analysis, whether that be xenos flesh, viral weapons casings or esoteric gene-tech.

otherAbilities.name: Surgical Precision:
otherAbilities.description: While this model is leading a unit, weapons equipped by models in that unit have the [LETHAL HITS] ability.

otherAbilities.name: Vivispectrum:
otherAbilities.description: If this modelâ€™s unit destroys an enemy unit as the result of a melee attack, until the end of the battle, this model has an Objective Control characteristic of 9.
